about_the_game:
Fight and stand your ground as you build a nation, research, and develop armies to earn the title of the Supreme Power. Make lasting choices on how you will forge a new empire. Will you create an economic powerhouse to eclipse all or take what is yours with sword and grit.

Construct and expand new districts to support your ever growing armies. Experiment with a variety of district types to which specialise to suit your needs. Do you need an industrial base for rapid development or a scientific research sector to get the technological edge over your opponents. 

Unlocked themed technology upgrades that enhance every aspect of your play. From new weapons, combat sections and equipment to unique abilities and modifiers to reach new highs. With enough technologies unlocked in a tech block, select from powerful innovation aspects that can change the way you play altogether.

 Enhance your identity by selecting from 24 different culture perks. But choose wisely as only 1 can be picked from 8 culture aspects. This ranges from raising resource output to changing district building slots. This system allows for you to decide, do you want massive cities with a large population to utilise or rich specialised zones with single districts producing thousands of resources alone.

By using the Focus Trees, you can passively progress towards bonus as you play. Each focus goal is tailored towards a playstyle. You can start with the Culture Focus to pick up early culture perks, then switch to a Food Focus to help support the growing needs of the population, or start with an Industrial Focus to establish new districts fast. The Focus Trees allow for you to lean towards a play style that you want to do.

Control a variety of ground based army types, made up of Combat Sections. Use long range guns to break down entrenched forces or fast armoured formations to flank exposed sides. The strength and damage of your forces can be improved by applying better weapons, upgrades and equipment that you unlock as you play. You have the option to rush a powerful upgrade with your technology or go for a economical build, winning through overwhelming numbers. Combat Sections can be equipped with multiple weapons and equipment, limited by the choices you make with the Tech Blocks, Culture and Focus Perks.

With manual saving and auto saves, you can pick up and play anytime and with Steam Cloud support, your save file can be returned to on different computers too. Feel free to experiment with different playstyles, if you make a mistake, reload a save and start anew.
